tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: McPixel [Part 4] - McCeption: The Elderly Scrolls
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: To hone his skills for future point and click adventures, Jesse spends this week learning the magic and majesty that is indie darling McPixel. • Get epic OMFGCata gear! goo.gl or www.rodeoarcade.com • Stay connected! Twitter - twitter.com Facebook - facebook.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Those girls looked like the﻿ powerpuff girls
YOU DONT SAY!﻿
noo... :(. that's the other way around. McPixel﻿ created an Electrode
Copied﻿ of pewdiepie!
DO THE LOCKED﻿ AND ENDLESS MODE!! :)
i would have thumb up but it was in caps so no.﻿
learn how to﻿ spell
electrode*﻿
Just got this game, it's﻿ really difficultttt ;c
mcpixel the only game where Jessy logic makes﻿ sense
6:42 "Ok.. take this﻿ and click everywhere (impression of a seal)"
Ha ha﻿ "pokeball, TO THE NUTS!"

ok pewdie did his after this﻿ one soooooooooooooo if ur using that idiot 5 year old logic pewdie would be copying omfgcata -_- and hasnt pewdie already said its not even copying its just someone else playing the game
NOOO! He didn't﻿ make out with Obama
Cool story, fellow bro. Welcome to﻿ the worshippers of the great Space Butterfly.
It was﻿ a pokeball to the pokeballs.
Will you fuck﻿ you?
jesse's﻿ puns are tearable

Dammit! How do I fix NORMAL computer problems?
KICK THE COMPUTER!!!
*realized it worked
.___.
HAHAHAHAHAHAHA XDDDDDDDDDDDDD priceless﻿
"TAKE THAT FRENCHIE!! YEEHAW!!"﻿ Best. Line. Ever. 9:25
... Why is Mine﻿ Turtle in the related/ featured video? XD XD
I wanted to share this because it's﻿ hilarious and I want this to go viral. Go here for a video of mcpixel dryhumping a ps3 to benny hill music for 10 hours! xD /watch?v=5Cb6ebGaSds
What does Jesse spell﻿ wrong?
"Explodelicious" sounds like a term that would﻿ be used in a Pop Rocks commercial. :)
Jesse, Jesse, Jesse. Round 1, Area 1: French﻿ people don't have dicks!
